meaningMnemonic: If you're on your <radical>scooter</radical> and you run over a <radical>root</radical>, you'll need to <kanji>retreat</kanji>. The roots have obviously <kanji>reject</kanji>ed you, they want you to leave, so you should.
readingMnemonic: You're trying to <kanji>retreat</kanji> by scooting backwards, but the roots grab onto your <reading>tie</reading> (たい). You try to pull your tie off but it's just getting tighter and tighter around your neck.
